patthana16.57:1.1_0: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nakenaci
patthana16.57:1.1_1: viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana16.57:1.1_2: paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ
patthana16.57:1.1_3: kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati
patthana16.57:1.1_4: hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanasappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.57:1.1_5: nakenaci viññeyyo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana16.57:2.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana16.57:3.1_0: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyañca anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyañca
patthana16.57:3.1_1: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
patthana16.57:3.1_2: … cha. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe pannarasa …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
patthana16.57:4.1_0: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanakenaci
patthana16.57:4.1_1: viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe tīṇi
